model.name: MyLockMe Chain Bag
model.disambiguatingDescription: With its cool envelope shape in a trendy small size, the Mylockme Chain Bag is the perfect everyday partner. Crafted with soft grained calf leather, the bag’s long chain strap can be doubled for short-shoulder carry or worn cross-body. A sleek and feminine choice suiting from day to evening, with room for all the essentials.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Chataigne Brown
  • Soft grained calfskin
  • Soft grained-calfskin trim
  • Microfiber lining
  • Gold-color hardware
  • LV Turn Lock
  • Flat front pocket
  • Inside flat pocket
  • Back zipped pocket
  • チェーン：スライド式, 取り外し不可
  • チェーンの頂点からバッグ上部までの長さ(最短)：29.0 cm
  • チェーンの頂点からバッグ上部までの長さ(最長)：53.0 cm

This reference is either Made in France, Spain, Italy or in the US.

model.name: Mylockme BB
model.disambiguatingDescription: For Spring Summer 2019, the Mylockme BB bag comes in a soft summery colorway of pink, off-white, and burgundy calfskin. The luminous color combination is completed by the silver color of the signature LV turn lock and the adjustable chain strap. The chain’s leather pad brings comfortable to shoulder carry and crossbody wear.

model.color: アリゾナ クオーツ キャラメル

panelInformations.title: Sustainability
panelInformations.description: The leather used in this product comes from a tannery audited and certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), which is the highest environmental standard in terms of leather tanning. This standard requires tanneries to reduce their water and energy consumption, as well as their use of potentially hazardous substances. The tanneries we work with are located in Europe and are committed partners who work with us in our efforts for responsible sourcing and continuous improvement (implementation of material traceability systems, fighting against deforestation practices).

model.name: Mylockme
model.disambiguatingDescription: A contemporary take on the classic school satchel, the Mylockme handbag is a sleek, ultra-fashionable model crafted from supple, grained calf leather and accented with the signature LV turn lock. Versatile and functional, with a well-organized interior, this piece is ideal for every day. It can be carried by hand, on the shoulder or worn cross-body.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• L 10.6 x H 7.8 x W 3.9 inches
  • Caramel Brown/Crème Beige/Black
  • Soft grained calfskin
  • Soft grained-calfskin trim
  • Microfiber lining
  • Silver-color hardware
  • Top handle for hand or elbow carry
  • Removable, adjustable strap (drop: min. 54 cm/21.3 inches, max. 59 cm/ 23.3 inches)
  • for shoulder or cross-body carry
  • LV turn lock
  • Flat front pocket
  • Zipped back pocket
  • 2 inside compartments
  • Double smartphone pocket
  • Inside open pocket

model.name: Mylockme Chain Bag
model.disambiguatingDescription: The elegant Mylockme Chain Bag handbag comes in black and cream grained calf leather with a flap in natural roccia python. The envelope-style flap, which is a key detail of the Mylockme line, is secured with an LV Turn lock. This bag features an adjustable strap for shoulder or cross-body carry.
